description: Stops a resource snapshot job. The job must be started prior to being stopped.

parameters.name: Catalog
parameters.description: Specifies the catalog related to the request. Valid values are: AWS: Stops the request from the production AWS environment. Sandbox: Stops the request from a sandbox environment used for testing or development purposes.

parameters.name: ResourceSnapshotJobIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the job to stop.
